code:
qr = QuantumRegister(3, name='q')
cr = ClassicalRegister(3, name='cr')
qc = QuantumCircuit(qr, cr)
qc.h(0)
qc.h(1)
qc.h(2)
## Begin Diffuser
qc.h(0)
qc.h(1)
qc.h(2)
qc.x(0)
qc.x(1)
qc.x(2)
qc.h(2)
qc.cx(0,2)
qc.cx(1,2)
qc.h(2)
qc.x(0)
qc.x(1)
qc.x(2)
qc.h(0)
qc.h(1)
qc.h(2)
qc.rzx( np.pi/4 , 1,0 )
qc.rx( np.pi , 0 )
## End Diffuser
qc.measure(0, 0)
qc.measure(1, 1)
qc.measure(2, 2)
